title: Depression
text: Depression: a complex mental health condition characterized by persistent feelings of sadness, hopelessness, and loss of interest or pleasure in activities.

title: Anxiety
text: Anxiety: a state of excessive worry, fear, and apprehension often accompanied by physical symptoms such as palpitations and sweating.

title: Alcohol Addiction
text: Alcohol addiction: a chronic disease characterized by a dependence on alcohol, leading to compulsive drinking despite negative consequences.

title: Eating Disorders
text: Eating disorders: serious mental health conditions characterized by abnormal eating habits, often associated with a distorted body image and intense fear of gaining weight.

title: Schizophrenia
text: Schizophrenia is a chronic and severe mental disorder characterized by disturbances in thoughts, perceptions, emotions, and behaviors.

title: Sleep
text: Sleep is a natural state of rest for the body and mind, crucial for cognitive function, physical health, and emotional well-being.

title: Personality Disorder
text: Personality disorder involves enduring patterns of inner experience and behavior that deviate markedly from societal expectations, causing distress or impairment.

title: Anxiety
text: Anxiety: a state of excessive worry, fear, and apprehension often accompanied by physical symptoms such as palpitations and sweating.
